name: @wesley/generator-js
description: Wesley JavaScript/TypeScript Generators - Models, Types, and Zod schemas

scripts.test: bash -lc 'shopt -s globstar nullglob; files=(test/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,mjs,ts,tsx} src/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,mjs,ts,tsx}); if [ ${#files[@]} -gt 0 ]; then vitest; else echo "No test files in @wesley/generator-js; skipping"; fi'

author: Wesley Team
